verses.text: In the \w tenth|strong="H6224"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, in the \w tenth|strong="H6224"\w* \add month\add*, in the \w twelfth|strong="H8147"\w* \add day\add* of the \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \w set|strong="H7760"\w* thy \w face|strong="H6440"\w* against \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* against him, and against all \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*:

\w Speak|strong="H1696"\w*, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Behold, I \add am\add* against thee, \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, the \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w dragon|strong="H8577"\w* that \w lieth|strong="H7257"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of his \w rivers|strong="H2975"\w*, which hath \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, My \w river|strong="H2975"\w* \add is\add* mine own, and I have \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \add it\add* for myself.

But I will \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w hooks|strong="H2397"\w* in thy \w jaws|strong="H3895"\w*, and I will cause the \w fish|strong="H1710"\w* of thy \w rivers|strong="H2975"\w* to \w stick|strong="H1692"\w* unto thy \w scales|strong="H7193"\w*, and I will bring thee \w up|strong="H5927"\w* out of the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of thy \w rivers|strong="H2975"\w*, and all the \w fish|strong="H1710"\w* of thy \w rivers|strong="H2975"\w* shall \w stick|strong="H1692"\w* unto thy \w scales|strong="H7193"\w*.

And I will \w leave|strong="H5203"\w* thee \add thrown\add* into the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, thee and all the \w fish|strong="H1710"\w* of thy \w rivers|strong="H2975"\w*: thou shalt \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* upon the \w open|strong="H6440"\w* \w fields|strong="H7704"\w*; thou shalt not be brought \w together|strong="H0622"\w*, nor \w gathered|strong="H6908"\w*: I have \w given|strong="H5414"\w* thee for \w meat|strong="H0402"\w* to the \w beasts|strong="H2416"\w* of the \w field|strong="H0776"\w* and to the \w fowls|strong="H5775"\w* of the \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*.\f + \fr 29.5 \ft open…: Heb. face of the field\f*

And all the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, because they have been a \w staff|strong="H4938"\w* of \w reed|strong="H7070"\w* to the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

When they took \w hold|strong="H8610"\w* of thee by thy \w hand|strong="H3709"\w*, thou didst \w break|strong="H7533"\w*, and \w rend|strong="H1234"\w* all their \w shoulder|strong="H3802"\w*: and when they \w leaned|strong="H8172"\w* upon thee, thou \w brakest|strong="H7665"\w*, and madest all their \w loins|strong="H4975"\w* to be at a \w stand|strong="H5976"\w*.

¶ Therefore thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Behold, I will \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* a \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* upon thee, and cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w* and \w beast|strong="H0929"\w* out of thee.

And the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* shall be \w desolate|strong="H8077"\w* and \w waste|strong="H2723"\w*; and they shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: because he hath \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, The \w river|strong="H2975"\w* \add is\add* mine, and I have \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \add it\add*.

Behold, therefore I \add am\add* against thee, and against thy \w rivers|strong="H2975"\w*, and I will \w make|strong="H5414"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w utterly|strong="H2721"\w* \w waste|strong="H2723"\w* \add and\add* \w desolate|strong="H8077"\w*, from the \w tower|strong="H4024"\w* of \w Syene|strong="H5482"\w* even unto the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* of \w Ethiopia|strong="H3568"\w*.\f + \fr 29.10 \ft utterly…: Heb. wastes of waste\f*\f + \fr 29.10 \ft from…: or, from Migdol to Syene\f*\f + \fr 29.10 \ft Syene: Heb. Seveneh\f*

No \w foot|strong="H7272"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w* shall pass \w through|strong="H5674"\w* it, nor \w foot|strong="H7272"\w* of \w beast|strong="H0929"\w* shall pass \w through|strong="H5674"\w* it, neither shall it be \w inhabited|strong="H3427"\w* \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*.

And I will \w make|strong="H5414"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w desolate|strong="H8077"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w countries|strong="H0776"\w* \add that are\add* \w desolate|strong="H8074"\w*, and her \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \add that are\add* laid \w waste|strong="H2717"\w* shall be \w desolate|strong="H8077"\w* \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*: and I will \w scatter|strong="H6327"\w* the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w* among the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, and will \w disperse|strong="H2219"\w* them through the \w countries|strong="H0776"\w*.

¶ Yet thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; At the \w end|strong="H7093"\w* of \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* will I \w gather|strong="H6908"\w* the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w* from the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* whither they were \w scattered|strong="H6327"\w*:

And I will bring \w again|strong="H7725"\w* the \w captivity|strong="H7622"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and will cause them to \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \add into\add* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Pathros|strong="H6624"\w*, into the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of their \w habitation|strong="H4351"\w*; and they shall be there a \w base|strong="H8217"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w*.\f + \fr 29.14 \ft habitation: or, birth\f*\f + \fr 29.14 \ft base: Heb. low\f*

It shall be the \w basest|strong="H8217"\w* of the \w kingdoms|strong="H4467"\w*; neither shall it \w exalt|strong="H5375"\w* itself any more above the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*: for I will \w diminish|strong="H4591"\w* them, that they shall no more \w rule|strong="H7287"\w* over the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*.

And it shall be no more the \w confidence|strong="H4009"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, which \w bringeth|strong="H2142"\w* \add their\add* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* to \w remembrance|strong="H2142"\w*, when they shall \w look|strong="H6437"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* them: but they shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*.

¶ And it came to pass in the \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* and \w twentieth|strong="H6242"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, in the \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \add month\add*, in the \w first|strong="H0259"\w* \add day\add* of the \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \w Nebuchadrezzar|strong="H5019"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* \w caused|strong="H5647"\w* his \w army|strong="H2428"\w* to \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w service|strong="H5656"\w* against \w Tyrus|strong="H6865"\w*: every \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \add was\add* made \w bald|strong="H7139"\w*, and every \w shoulder|strong="H3802"\w* \add was\add* \w peeled|strong="H4803"\w*: yet had he no \w wages|strong="H7939"\w*, nor his \w army|strong="H2428"\w*, for \w Tyrus|strong="H6865"\w*, for the \w service|strong="H5656"\w* that he had \w served|strong="H5647"\w* against it:

Therefore thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Behold, I will \w give|strong="H5414"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* unto \w Nebuchadrezzar|strong="H5019"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*; and he shall \w take|strong="H5375"\w* her \w multitude|strong="H1995"\w*, and \w take|strong="H7997"\w* her \w spoil|strong="H7998"\w*, and \w take|strong="H0962"\w* her \w prey|strong="H0957"\w*; and it shall be the \w wages|strong="H7939"\w* for his \w army|strong="H2428"\w*.\f + \fr 29.19 \ft take her spoil…: Heb. spoil her spoil, and prey her prey\f*

I have \w given|strong="H5414"\w* him the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \add for\add* his \w labour|strong="H6468"\w* wherewith he \w served|strong="H5647"\w* against it, because they \w wrought|strong="H6213"\w* for me, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 29.20 \ft for his…: or, for his hire\f*

¶ In that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* will I \w cause|strong="H6779"\w* the \w horn|strong="H7161"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* to bud \w forth|strong="H6779"\w*, and I will \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee the \w opening|strong="H6610"\w* of the \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of them; and they shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
